tips.title: Create a Budget
tips.content: Track your income and expenses to make better financial decisions.

tips.title: Cook at Home
tips.content: Eating out is expensive. Save money by preparing meals at home.

tips.title: Automate Savings
tips.content: Set up automatic transfers to your savings account each month.

tips.title: Use Coupons
tips.content: Look for online or in-store coupons to save money on purchases.

tips.title: Reduce Energy Usage
tips.content: Lower your energy bills by turning off lights and appliances when not in use.

tips.title: Buy Generic Brands
tips.content: Generic brands offer the same quality as name brands at a lower cost.

tips.title: Avoid Impulse Buying
tips.content: Give yourself time to consider before making unplanned purchases.
